name: Backstreet Brawlers
description:
Gangs have taken control of New York City!  Citizens are in a state of worry as crooked authorities turn a blind eye towards the recent gang activity. It is up to you to clean up New York City.

Features 

  • Classic 2D style beat em up
  • A lot of bugs

Featuring a classic side-scrolling beat em up, Backstreet Brawlers is a 15 week project for the Academy of Art University's combat course.
